Title: McCullom Lake, IL
Descriptive Text: McHenry County, 52 miles NW of the Loop. Beginning as a string of summer cottages along the north shore of a lake northwest of McHenry in the 1920s, McCullom Lake incorporated in 1955 to allow local control of lake maintenance and road improvements. The village has remained a moderate-income bedroom community, with a population of 1,038 in 2000.
Bibliography: McHenry County in the Twentieth Century, 1968–1994. McHenry County Historical Society. 1994.Nye, Lowell A., ed. McHenry County, Illinois, 1832–1968. 1968.
